description:
Send fun ascii art and funky fonts straight from your webOS device over SMS!

(\__/)
(>'.'<)
(")_(")

S
o

f
u
n
!

This ascii art is tweaked to look great when sending to webOS devices, but unlike TextPics for iPhone, texter will also work for other smartphones and dinky feature phones :)

We are just getting started, but you can already choose from Animals, Love, Emoticons, Holidays and Occasions, Transportation, and Weapons. If you are composing text, you have over five fun fonts to choose from including vertical, reverse, block, italics, morse code, and binary!

WARNING! When you send a text, the image is going to look crazy and messed up. But don't worry! The message will look correct to the person receiving the text. Try sending some to yourself and you will see!

What else would you like to see? Feel free to contact us with ideas & support at clearwaterapps.com
